footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Mona | Update Date: 10/04/2022 | Editor: Ultimate Noob#2955

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
This weapon offers a 48% ATK Bonus, which can be quite a significant bonus. Using this weapon can make it challenging for you to fulfil Mona's stringent ER requirements.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__More ER needed__: Favonious Codex
__Healing needed__: Prototype Amber
__Electro team__: Hakushin Ring

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Hydro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate/CRIT Damage

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Stellaris Phantasm
**2)** Elemental Skill: Mirror Reflection of Doom
**3)** Normal Attack: Ripple of Fate

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Hakushin Ring should only be used in her taser teams (teams using electro characters). CRIT Rate is only considered when using Favonius Codex, and offensive stats can be ignored apart from Energy Recharge. In order to fulfil Mona's high ER requirements, two-piece Emblem of Severed Fate might be required.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Mona | Update Date: 10/07/2022 | Editor: Ultimate Noob#2955

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds 
is the BiS weapon for Mona while playing this playstyle. Keep in mind that you do need to maintain 1 stack for it to be the best option (4 seconds)

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Resets__: The Widsith
__Second BiS__: Skyward Atlas
__Has a shield__: Memory of Dust
__Stat Stick__: Solar Pearl, Kagura's Verity, Blackcliff Agate

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Hydro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Stellaris Phantasm
**2)** Normal Attack: Ripple of Fate
**3)** Elemental Skill: Mirror Reflection of Doom

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
When working as a Burst-DPS (depending on the amount of Energy Recharge Mona has) the Emblem of Severed Fate set will be generally more suitable, being synergetic with her ascension passive which Increases Mona’s Hydro DMG% by 20% of Mona’s total Energy Recharge. The Widsith, especially at higher refinements, will have higher general damage than most  5-star catalysts, at the expense of your time. The downtime on this catalyst’s buffs can be ignored in the Elemental Burst focused playstyle. Elemental Mastery sands should only be used when she is able to consistently Vaporize her Elemental Burst or other attacks. 

**__Disclaimer__:**
This is only useful for getting 1 big damage number, and cannot be used for sustained damage over multiple rotations.
